answers.author: Peter Husenitza
answers.text:
We are in the process of replacing our IBM iSeries Financial systems with the Sungard ONESolution Windows.Net system. This is part of a phased replacement of our Payroll/HR, Permitting, Planning, Code Enforcement and Court systems to the ONESolution integrated applications. The Financial implementation will be first.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Sonoma County, CA is looking to purchase a new financial management system. They are developing a business case for the Board to fund the purchase and seeking data and information that will help support staff’s recommendation to replace the existing 25-year old main frame system.  The new financial system will need to interface with a new HR system, ePersonality from Highline that is currently being implemented.
Copies of your council/board reports, studies, etc. that you used when replacing a financial system would be very helpful!  Sonoma County has narrowed the vendor search to Tyler Technologies – software Tyler Munis and CIBER – Software PeopleSoft.  If you have any information re: either vendor would be appreciated too!
Thank you in advance,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Replacing Financial System
